Description: Vase with 'splashed' decoration, made of yellow, green, blue glazed pottery.
Curator's comments: On AK card and label on the base: '830 Major Nixon's from Baghdad'.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Maj William Joseph Myers
Previous owner/ex-collection: Thomas David Gibson Carmichael, 1st Baron Carmichael (his sale, Sotheby's, 8 June 1926, lot 124)
